title: Davidâ€™s Military Victories
summary: David defeats several enemy nations including the Philistines, Moabites, and Edomites. He dedicates the spoils to the Lord and establishes a strong administration over Israel.

faq.question: Who did David defeat in this chapter?
faq.answer: The Philistines, Moabites, Syrians, and Edomites.

faq.question: What did David do with the plunder?
faq.answer: He dedicated it to the Lord.
